remarks: Part of proof of Lemma E in [Crawley] p. 113.  (Contributed by NM, 9-Feb-2013.)
statement:
cdleme30.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
cdleme30.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
cdleme30.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
cdleme30.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
cdleme30.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
cdleme30.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
cdleme30a $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( s e. A /\ ( X e. B /\ -. X .<_ W ) /\ Y e. B ) /\ ( ( s .\/ ( X ./\ W ) ) = X /\ X .<_ Y ) ) -> ( s .\/ ( Y ./\ W ) ) = Y ) $.
